mods.abstract: "Possessed" is the story of Marian Martin (Joan Crawford), a factory girl who moves to Manhattan looking for excitement and hoping to trade her life on the assembly line for one more posh. When she meets lawyer Mark Whitney (Clark Gable), she thinks her dreams have come true%3A he is rich and handsome and can buy her the life she dreams of. Unfortunately, he is already married and his political ambitions would be destroyed by a divorce scandal. Thus, Martin becomes his mistress and poses as his ex-wife. When her small town ex-boyfriend Al Manning (Wallace Ford) asks her to marry him, she turns him down and he exposes Whitney's sordid private life. Martin is forced to defend her relationship with Whitney at an election rally, and her story moves the crowd to tears. Relieved, Whitney proposes to Martin, thus fulfilling her ambitions.
